# cmccloudv2_iam_group (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create group
resource "cmccloudv2_iam_group" "dev" {
	name        = "dev"
	description = "group from tf"
}
```

## Schema

- `name` (String) The name of the IAM group.
